item.title: My blog site setup tips
item.description: The first mistake you might have about Github Pages is about the difference between User & Org Pages and Project Page. It takes me a while to realize that the first page can only point to the static content in master branch, which you don’t have the possiblity of switching to gh-page branch or master/doc (you can do that with project repo though) Select a good theme for blogging, I tried After Dark, Hugo Nuo, Future Imperfect, Cactus,
